text: Khyber () is a district in the Peshawar Division of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province of Pakistan. Before it was a tribal area in the Federally Administered Tribal Areas (FATA) region. It includes: * Bara Tehsil * Jamrud Tehsil * Landi Kotal Tehsil * Mula Ghori Tehsil == References ==
title: Khyber District
